wikipedia_page.main: Ian Home Bowhill (1903–1975)  was a Scottish figure skater. He represented Great Britain at the 1928 Winter Olympics and placed 14th.His wife, Elizabeth Bowhill, was an amateur golfer and was runner-up in the 1937 Scottish Women's Amateur Championship.
